portfolio.title: French Learning App
portfolio.purpose: To help people studying French learn the different conjugation forms of most common French words.
features: Let's users practice French verb forms with flashcards and tests
Users can create an account and bookmark difficult words
List of all the forms for each verb
Users can change their email address, password or delete their account under settings
Password reset system for users who forget their login

portfolio.title: Asteroid Tracker
portfolio.stack: Node, Express for backend, Vanilla JavaScript, CSS and HTML for frontend
portfolio.purpose: See how many Nearth Earth Objects (NEOs) are orbiting the Earth.
features: Let's users check the number of NEOs for a specified day
Provides more information about the NEO, e.g. size, speed and whether it is potentially dangerous
Custom error message illustrations, e.g. if there are no NEOs or user input incorrect date format

about.title: Interactive CSS background animation
about.description: Using only HTML and CSS, create an animated background

about.title: Glassmorphism tutorial
about.description: Explaining how to create the Glassmorphism effect
